H0.text: Who was shot and killed along with his mistress Clara Petacci on 28th April 1945. Adolf Hitler

H1.text: Who was shot and killed along with his mistress Clara Petacci on 28th April 1945. Benito Mussolini's brother

H2.text: Who was shot and killed along with his mistress Clara Petacci on 28th April 1945. Hermann GÃ¶ring

H3.text: Who was shot and killed along with his mistress Clara Petacci on 28th April 1945. Musilini

A4.text: Mussolini and his mistress Clara Petacci were captured by communist partisans and executed on 28 April 1945.

A5.text: Adolf Hitler made Mussolini the figurehead of a puppet state in German-occupied north Italy, the Italian Social Republic.

A6.text: On the following day, the bodies of Mussolini and Petacci were taken to Piazzale Loreto in Milan and hung upside down in front of a petrol station.

A7.text: On 28 April, she and Mussolini were taken to Mezzegra and executed.

A9.text: Hitler killed himself in Berlin, shortly before the city fell to the Red Army.

A10.text: Mussolini was captured and killed by Italian partisans on 28 April as he and an entourage attempted to flee.
